blog.name: more-of-a-city-kitty
blog.title: I’m More Of A City Kitty, Ya Dig?
blog.description:
*ear rape ensues*

Side-blog for all the bnha stuff I like. I’m a multi shipper so... there’s that. My main blog is @sadamericanorca

summary: Yo yo yo my first post here!
body:
Yo yo yo my first post here!

Anyways hi hello this is my side blog for all things Boku no Hero Academia that I like. That includes art, fanfics, theories, ships and so on so forth. I’m a multi shipper so if you wanna hang you gotta be cool with that. I’m not that new to the my hero fandom I just wanted to introduce myself to this blog.

~ Hope

summary:
[bnha] Mezo Shoji doodles (Colored Ver.) 

Colored version by DocInferno (Patrick) and me!  Maybe he's a bit ugly but as a...
caption:
[bnha] Mezo Shoji doodles (Colored Ver.)

Colored version by DocInferno (Patrick) and me!

Maybe he’s a bit ugly but as a character he’s very nice, mature and loyal *shrug* It’s sad that bnha fandom don’t like him and he has only few good fanarts on DA [*]
——–
A requests with this character are available!
Just send me a note with your idea and tell me if you want be anonymous or not. Please write simple sentences because my english is poor </3
PS: I don’t draw OC x Canon. I just don’t like it, sorry.

Shoji appreciates every single fav!
free to use with credit.

blog.name: matchups-everywhere
blog.title: Matchups, imagines, and headcanons!
blog.description: [askbox:OPEN!] I'm bunny and I like My Hero Acadamia, Danganronpa, and Voltron. Rules

summary: Could I request an adult male BNHA matchup please? Can be Pro or Villain, just no students/teens, please. I'm 5'4'' with the...
question: Could I request an adult male BNHA matchup please? Can be Pro or Villain, just no students/teens, please. I'm 5'4'' with the mouth of a 8' tall behemoth. I can be a little rowdy but I always have the best intentions. I enjoy fun and learning, and my favorite thing to do is sing and dance like no one is watching, even if they are. I do have my calm moments though, where I just want to cuddle up with my pets, grab some tea, and just binge watch musicals. I highly value emotional support in an s/o!
answer:
‘mouth of a 8′ tall behemoth’ sksk i CACKLED 

I match you with…

All Might!

(uwu first ever request with him) Your rowdiness always manages to make him laugh! Hell, your entire personality just makes him very happy! He loves to listen to you sing and watch you dance, and with enough convincing, he might even dance with you! He will be a glad addition to your cuddle pile don’t worry he’ll bring snacks. Toshinori is also practically an emotional support dog in human form, he’ll make sure to bring you lots of love!


I hope you liked your matchup! - Mod Bunny

Requests are open!

blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

summary: When You Find Love, I Hope It Burns Like A Sunset
title: When You Find Love, I Hope It Burns Like A Sunset
description:
by Stringlish

It never ceased; that soul-stirring feeling…

The still of these quiet mornings, as warm scarlet orbs watched intently over a threadbare shoulder; the object of his affection, the same boy he’d known when his world was formed over an era ago.

Words: 1267, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Early Mornings, Reflection, Married Couple, Romantic Fluff, (Could be set in the ‘In A Sky Of A Million Stars (Who Cares If One More Light Goes Out)’ universe), Birthday Story for Sammy, bakudeku, Inspired by Music, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Slight canon compliant

tags: bakugou is the memelord and all pro memers cower before him
summary:
broke: bakugou refuses to meme
woke: bakugou subtly incorporates obscure memes in everything he does, but so subtly that only...
body:
broke: bakugou refuses to meme

woke: bakugou subtly incorporates obscure memes in everything he does, but so subtly that only those most fluent in memeguage are capable of understanding them

have an example my frienr provided me (i owe her my life this is hilarious):

midnight: /rejects baku’s hero name/

baku: what am i supposed to put?? some dumb shit like black-gloom-disease-bird-road

kaminari: w.what the FUCK is taht ebony dementia raven way

baku, looking straight into kaminari’s soul: what the fuck is that?

blog.name: sabswokeanime

blog.description: Soul Society is a third world country | Yaoi is life | A some-what WOKE blog

summary: If Haikyuu characters meet BNHA characters
body:
If Haikyuu characters meet BNHA characters

1. Hinata and Izuku

Hinata: So, you idolized someone too?!!!

Deku, fanboy activate: Y-Yes… I HAVE 10 FIGURINES OF ALL MIGHT, 40 WALL POSTERS! YOU WANNA SEE?!?!?

Hinata: You’re creepy!

2. Nishinoya and Bakugou

Nishinoya:

Bakugou:

Bakugou: WHAT CHA’ LOOKIN’ AT SHITTY HEAD!!!

Nishinoya: YOU SAID SOMETHING PUNK!?

3. Kenma and Todoroki

Kenma: Shouyou was the one who made me realize that Volleyball was fun.

Todoroki: He must be a really good friend. My classmate made me realize my true potential as a hero.

4. Kageyama and Iida

Iida: I’ve been trying to change the way I speak because people keep on telling me I came from the elites.

Kageyama: I was once called King of the Upper Court

Iida: That wasn’t so bad, but why?

Kageyama: Everyone sucks, I am a one man team

Iida: You must be really a bad person.

5. Oikawa and Aoyama

Oikawa: *sparkles*

Aoyama: *sparkles*

Iwaizumi: I need an eye doctor right now.

6. Tsukishima and Shirigaki

Shirigaki: I am very sinister and I have a very warped personality.

Tsukishima: I can be more than that.

Shirigaki: Welcome to the League of Villains!

Aoyama: *sparkles*

Iwaizumi: I need an eye doctor right now.

6. Tsukishima and Shirigaki

Shirigaki: I am very sinister and I have a very warped personality.

Tsukishima: I can be more than that.

Shirigaki: Welcome to the League of Villains!

summary: I had an Idea. So I made it. The first picture is a BNHA (or MHA) Character Sheet with a bunch’ o prompts. You fill them out and...
caption:
I had an Idea. So I made it. The first picture is a BNHA (or MHA) Character Sheet with a bunch’ o prompts. You fill them out and it should look like the one on the bottom. Have fun and think outside the box, and in the ovals!

Please reblog and don’t repost. If you have to repost, tag me.

NOTE: This isn’t limited to Teachers and 1-A students!!! Think of heroes and students with less screentime! This is heavily encouraged!!!

Also don’t be afraid to tag people you know to take place in this!
\/   \/   \/   \/   \/   \/   \/
@kit-cats-world @4nonymity @sleepingpastnoon
